title: [Old Stone Tower]
description: Sunlight gleams in through broken chunks and cracks in the walls of the stone tower.  The bloated carcass of a rodent lies next to a tarnished silver plate on the ground.  Once, a flight of stone stairs led to the top of the tower, but have since collapsed.

Moonlight gleams in through broken chunks and cracks in the walls of the stone tower.  The bloated carcass of a rodent lies next to a tarnished silver plate on the ground.  Once, a flight of stone stairs led to the top of the tower, but have since collapsed.
